verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] shown a penchant for rewarding political loyalists with pardons . That may have implications for Special Counsel Robert Mueller 's probe .
[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: shown] [ARG1: a penchant for rewarding political loyalists with pardons] . That may have implications for Special Counsel Robert Mueller 's probe .
[ARG0: President Trump] has shown a penchant for [V: rewarding] [ARG1: political loyalists] [ARGM-MNR: with pardons] . That may have implications for Special Counsel Robert Mueller 's probe .
President Trump has shown a penchant for rewarding political loyalists with pardons . That [V: may] have implications for Special Counsel Robert Mueller 's probe .
President Trump has shown a penchant for rewarding political loyalists with pardons . [ARG0: That] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: have] [ARG1: implications for Special Counsel Robert Mueller 's probe] .
